changeSet.sql:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[AlcadaLog]') AND type in (N'U'))
BEGIN CREATE TABLE AlcadaLog (IDAuditRecord INT NOT NULL IDENTITY(1,1), IDAuditUser INT NOT NULL, dhAuditStamp DATE NOT NULL, cdAuditKind INT NOT NULL, IDAlcada INT NOT NULL, IDPerfil INT NOT NULL, blAlterarSugestao BIT NOT NULL, blAlterarInformacaoEstoque BIT NOT NULL, blAlterarPercentual BIT NOT NULL, vlPercentualAlterado DECIMAL(9,2) NULL, blZerarItem BIT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY (IDAuditRecord)); END

rollback.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[AlcadaLog]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[AlcadaLog]
